abstract: The shipping method selected by the user.
overview:
## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayShippingMethod].

This attribute is contained by the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onshippingmethodselected] event. Access this attribute using the `event` parameter in the callback function; for example, `var myShippingMethod = event.shippingMethod;`.

# shippingMethod

**Instance Property**

The shipping method selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute ApplePayShippingMethod shippingMethod;
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayShippingMethod].

This attribute is contained by the [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePaySession/onshippingmethodselected] event. Access this attribute using the `event` parameter in the callback function; for example, `var myShippingMethod = event.shippingMethod;`.
title: shippingMethod
